# Main

<ForEach arr={props.arr}>
  ## Nested 1

  ### Nested 2
</ForEach>

<ForEach arr={props.arr}>
  ## Component {item}
</ForEach>

<ForEach arr={props.arr} as="outerItem">
  ## Nested

    <ForEach arr={props.arr} as="innerItem">
      ## Component {innerItem.num}
    </ForEach>
</ForEach>

<ForEach arr={props.arr} as="outerItem">
  ### Outer Loop {outerItem}

  <ForEach arr={props.arr} as="innerItem">
    * Inner Loop: {innerItem}
  </ForEach>
</ForEach>
